entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
